content: this is the crochet pattern to make this rainbow bag for this bag i used leftovers yarn and colors epic and a 4 5 mm hook in the colours 011 013 015 018 026 031 040 042 048 050 070 071 072 074 en 075 a complete yarn package is available on wolplein dutch 1 and yarnplaza international 2 with this yarn hook and following the pattern the bag will be about 34 cm by 36 cm this is easily made bigger or smaller explained in the pattern a free version of this pattern is available on my blog https //studiomadelaine blogspot com/2023/04/the-rainbow-bag html the pdf version of the pattern has more explanation a chart and photo tutorials on the pattern 1 https //www wolplein nl/artikel/56420/regenboog-tas-garen-en-haakpakket html 2 https //www yarnplaza com/product/56459/rainbow-bag-yarn-and-crochetkit html
